title: SIP high level metadata
description: High level metadata defining a SIP accepted by CERN Digital Memory OAIS.

source.description: A unique string identiyfing the upstream source (producer).

resource_id.description: A unique (in the context of the upstream source) string identifier for the resource

sip_creation_timestamp.description: Date time timestamp of SIP creation

metadata.description: Describes if the file is to be considered metadata

metadata_ref.description: File name of the file the metadata refers to
